_header: O worthy Lord and most of might
Subjects: Christ, carols to; carols, to Christ
_description: A macaronic song to Christ — four quatrains (abab) with Latin caudae and burden (bb): ‘Into this world now ys cum / Christe, redemptor omnium’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
O worthy lord & most of myghtEterne rex
                    altyssime…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Grant vs thy blis euerlastyngSummi lorgitor
                    primiiExplicit
